output:
> After purchasing FileBot via Paddle, you will receive `2 emails`. The first email from `help@paddle.com` will contain your license as plain text. The second email from `license@filebot.net` will contain your license as file attachment. Either one can be used to activate FileBot.
ðŸ“˜ https://www.filebot.net/activate.html

> If you want to recover a lost license key or a never received license key, please contact Paddle with your name, email and payment details so they can look up your order and resend your license confirmation. If you have multiple purchases under your email address, then you must include payment details so that they can look up your most recent order.
ðŸ“˜ https://www.filebot.net/activate.html
How to request a refund: https://www.filebot.net/refund.html

> If you have received no email at all then you have likely mistyped your email address or your mail server is rejecting emails. In this case, please contact Paddle with your payment details so they can help you look up your order number and resend your license.
ðŸ“˜ https://www.filebot.net/activate.html

Add Exclude Terms to Improve Movie / Series Auto-Detection: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=359
Exclude Blacklist & Series-Mappings: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=360
Latest Beta Revisions and Release Candidates: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=1609
How to install FileBot (portable) on Linux / FreeBSD / Solaris / any Unix OS: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=6057
@file syntax for reading cmdline args from text files: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=3244

> GUI: Press `F5` and then click the â„¹ï¸ information symbol
> CLI: Call `filebot -script fn:sysinfo`
ðŸ“˜ https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=1868
License Error: Banned due to abuse: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=9594

How to process only specific kinds of files: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=4222

  --filter and fine-tuning: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=2127

> FileBot does parse file headers to read embedded media properties. This will be relatively fast since MediaInfo will only read the first few megabytes of each file, but if File I/O is expensive, then you'll want to configure FileBot to not parse embedded media properties at all.
> Remote file systems typically do not support Extended Attributes so you'll want to configure FileBot to store metadata into a .xattr folder / plain file structure.
ðŸ“˜ https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=12022

GUI: Press F5 to open the Groovy Pad and then press the :warning: Error Log button: `runScript 'logs'`

CLI: `filebot -script fn:logs`
